anya-e0905n3:2_1: ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṁ āvuso porāṇakehi saṁgītikāramahātherehi kaṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgītaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:3_0: Vissajjanā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṁ bhante porāṇakehi saṁgītikāramahātherehi khandhakā saṁgītā.
anya-e0905n3:4_0: Pucchā – te pana āvuso khandhakā vaggabhedena katividhā.
anya-e0905n3:5_0: Vissajjanā – te pana bhante khandhakā duvidhā vaggabhedena mahāvaggo cūḷavaggoti.
anya-e0905n3:6_0: Pucchā – mahāvagge āvuso kati khandhakā pariyāpannā.
anya-e0905n3:7_3: mahākhandhako uposathakkhandhako vassūpanāyikakkhandhako pavāraṇākkhandhako cammakkhandhako bhesajjakkhandhako
anya-e0905n3:8_0: Pucchā – mahākhandhake āvuso bahū kathāyo, katamā tāsaṁ ādikathā.
anya-e0905n3:12_1: tasmātiha āvuso tato paṭṭhāya taṁ pucchissāmi,
anya-e0905n3:12_2: bhagavā āvuso paṭhamābhisambuddhakāle kattha kīvacīraṁ kenākārena vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:13_1: bhagavā bhante paṭhamābhisambuddho bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedī.
anya-e0905n3:14_0: Pucchā – tadā āvuso bhagavā kīdisaṁ dhammaṁ manasikatvā kīdisaṁ udānaṁ udānesi.
anya-e0905n3:15_1: tadā bhante bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
anya-e0905n3:15_2: anulomaṁ paṭilomaṁ manasikatvā tīṇi udānāni udānesi.
anya-e0905n3:17_0: Pucchā – tassa āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:18_1: tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā ajapāla nigrodhamūle vihāsi,
anya-e0905n3:20_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:21_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā mucalindamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
anya-e0905n3:22_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:23_1: tassapi bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedī.
anya-e0905n3:24_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:25_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā punadeva ajapālanigrodhamūle vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:26_0: Pucchā – tasmiṁ pana āvuso ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato kathaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n3:27_1: tasmiṁ pana bhante ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa dhammagambhīratāpaṭisaṁyutto cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n3:28_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso aranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacarā nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
anya-e0905n3:31_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tadā dhammadesanāya brahmayācanā ca bhagavato paṭiññāca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:32_3: santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti,
anya-e0905n3:32_4: bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāroti iti bhante brahmuno dhammadesanāya yācanā ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:37_0: Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavato dhammadesanāya paṭiññā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:42_1: evaṁ kho āvuso bhagavā dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṁ katvā paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ desento kattha kīdisaṁ dhammaṁ kassa desesi.
anya-e0905n3:43_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiya bhikkhupamukhānaṁ brahmagaṇānaṁ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṁ desesi.
anya-e0905n3:44_1: tasmiṁ kho pana āvuso dhammacakkapavattanasutte desiyamāne manussaloke kassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:45_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmato bhante koṇḍaññassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:46_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ nu kho āvuso imasmiṁ buddhasāsane paṭhamaṁ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:47_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṁ bhante buddhasāsane paṭhamaṁ ehibhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:48_0: Labheyyāhaṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:49_0: Ehi bhikkhu svākhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n3:50_0: Pucchā – itaresaṁ pana āvuso catunnaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ kadā dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:51_4: catutthe bhante divase āyasmato assajissa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:52_0: Pucchā – sabbesampi āvuso tesaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kadā arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n3:53_1: sabbesampi bhante tesaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pakkhassa pañcamiyaṁ anattalakkhaṇasutte desiyamāne arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n3:54_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n3:55_1: yasappamukhānaṁ bhante catupaññāsa sahāyakānaṁ pabbajitakāle bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n3:57_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjūpa sampadā anuññāto ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:58_1: yasappamukhānaṁ bhante catupaññāsāya gihi sahāyakānaṁ pabbajitvā tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya
anya-e0905n3:58_2: pesitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:59_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
anya-e0905n3:60_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ ārāmo paṭiggaṇhituṁ kattha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:61_1: bhagavatā bhante bhikkhūnaṁ ārāmaṁ paṭiggaṇhituṁ rājagahe anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:61_2: rājā bhante māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa veḷuvanaṁ uyyānaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n3:62_0: Etāhaṁ bhante veḷuvanaṁ uyyānaṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi –
anya-e0905n3:64_0: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso dvinnaṁ aggasāvakānaṁ pabbajjūpasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:65_0: Vissajjanā – dvinnaṁ bhante aggasāvakānaṁ ehi bhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:72_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṁ hetuṁ tathāgato;
anya-e0905n3:73_0: Āha tesañca yo nirodho, evaṁ vādī mahāsamaṇo.
anya-e0905n3:75_0: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṁ me sāvakayugaṁ bhavissati aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:76_0: Labheyyāma mayaṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ labheyyāma upasampadaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:77_0: Etha bhikkhavo svākhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n3:78_0: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:79_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:79_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:80_1: upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:81_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:81_2: sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:82_1: kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:83_1: rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:84_0: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarati.
anya-e0905n3:85_0: Ahaṁ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarāmi.
anya-e0905n3:86_0: Sādhu sādhu sāriputta, kataññuno hi sāriputta sappurisā katavedino.
anya-e0905n3:88_0: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṁ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
anya-e0905n3:90_1: ayācitakaṁ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṁ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:91_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:91_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṁ anācāraṁ acari,
anya-e0905n3:92_1: catunnaṁ āvuso nissayānaṁ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:93_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:93_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji,
anya-e0905n3:95_0: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
anya-e0905n3:96_1: ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:97_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ upasenaṁ vaṅgantaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:97_2: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṁ upasampādesi,
anya-e0905n3:98_1: bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:99_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:99_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:100_0: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:101_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:101_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā
anya-e0905n3:101_3: anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:102_1: pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:103_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:103_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:104_0: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ na pabbājeyyuṁ…
anya-e0905n3:105_1: rājabhaṭaṁ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:106_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:107_1: dhajabandhaṁ āvuso coraṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:108_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṁ coraṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:108_2: aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n3:109_1: kārabhedakaṁ āvuso coraṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:110_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:111_1: iṇāyikaṁ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:112_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:113_1: dāsaṁ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:114_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:115_1: bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:116_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṁ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto
anya-e0905n3:116_2: mātāpitūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n3:117_1: ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:118_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:118_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:119_0: Na bhikkhave jānaṁ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
anya-e0905n3:120_1: mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṁ puttaṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:121_2: rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā varaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:121_3: sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṁ mātāpitūhi puttaṁ pabbājeyyunti,
anya-e0905n3:122_0: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n3:123_1: theyyasaṁvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:124_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ purāṇakulaputtaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:124_2: aññataro bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni
anya-e0905n3:124_3: vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvasi,
anya-e0905n3:125_1: tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:126_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ nāgaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:126_2: aññataro bhante nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:127_1: mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:128_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante aññataraṁ māṇavakaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:128_2: aññataro ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṁ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṁ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n3:130_1: apattacīvarakaṁ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṁ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:131_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:132_0: Pucchā – upasampadaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ sauddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:133_0: Vissajjanā – upasampadaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:135_1: cātuddase ca āvuso pannarase ca pakkhassa ca aṭṭhamiyā sannipatitvā dhammaṁ bhāsituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:136_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:136_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū cātuddesa pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:137_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatituṁ.
anya-e0905n3:139_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhuddeso bhagavatā anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:140_1: yadā bhante bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “yaṁnūnāhaṁ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṁ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0905n3:140_3: so nesaṁ bhavissati uposathakamma”nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhuddeso anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:141_0: Pucchā – sīmaṁ āvuso sammanituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kismiñca vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:142_2: rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi “bhagavatā paññattaṁ ettāvatā sāmaggī,
anya-e0905n3:143_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n3:145_1: kati āvuso uposathakammāni tesu ca kīdisaṁ uposathakammaṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:146_6: Tatra bhante yadidaṁ adhammena vaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:146_7: adhammena samaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ dhammena vaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:146_9: tatra bhante yadidaṁ dhammena samaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:147_0: Pucchā – uposathaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:148_0: Vissajjanā – uposathaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:150_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:151_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:151_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:153_1: dvemā bhante vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā purimikā pacchimikā,
anya-e0905n3:153_4: imā kho bhante dve vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:154_1: vassaṁ āvuso upagantvā purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ avasitvā cārikaṁ pakkamantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:155_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:155_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vassaṁ upagantvā antarā vassaṁ cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:156_1: sattāha karaṇīyena āvuso pahite gantuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:157_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:157_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū udenena upāsakena pahite na gacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:158_1: sattāhakaraṇīyena āvuso sattannaṁ apahitepi gantuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:159_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātugilāna vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:160_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena apahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
anya-e0905n3:161_1: kismiṁci āvuso antarāye sati antovassaṁ pakkamituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:162_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:162_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:163_1: rukkha susire vā āvuso rukkhaviṭabhiyā vā ajjhokāse vā vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:164_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:164_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rukkhasusirepi rukkhaviṭabhiyāpi ajjhokāsepi vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:165_1: asenāsanikena āvuso vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:166_1: tasmiṁyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṁ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:166_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:167_1: chavakuṭikāya vā āvuso chatte vā cāṭiyā vā vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:168_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:168_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chavakuṭikāyapi chattepi cāṭiyāpi vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:169_1: paṭissavaṁ āvuso visaṁ vādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:170_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:170_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassaṁ vāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādesi,
anya-e0905n3:171_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:174_1: vassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ tīhi ṭhānehi pavārituṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:175_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:175_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sandiṭṭhā sambhattā antovassaṁ neva ālapiṁsu na sallapiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:176_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:176_1: diṭṭheva vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
anya-e0905n3:177_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso pavāraṇā divasavasena ca puggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n3:178_0: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tisso pavāraṇā, tathā puggalavasena kātabbākāravasenaca.
anya-e0905n3:179_1: katīnaṁ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:179_2: katīnaṁ panāvuso aññamaññaṁ pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:180_1: pañcannaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ saṅghe pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:180_2: catunnaṁ vā bhante tiṇṇaṁ vā dvinnaṁ vā aññamaññaṁ pavāretuṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:181_0: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṁvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṁ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:182_0: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:183_0: Pucchā – pavāraṇaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:184_0: Vissajjanā – pavāraṇaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:187_0: Pucchā – upāhanaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:188_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:188_2: āyasmato bhante soṇassa accāraddhavīriyassa caṅkamato pādā bhijjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:189_1: sabbanīlikā vā āvuso sabbapītikā vā sabbalohitikā vā sabbamañjiṭṭhikā vā sabbakaṇhā vā sabbamahāraṅgarattā
anya-e0905n3:189_2: vā sabbamahānāmarattā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0905n3:190_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:190_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlikāyo upāhanāyo dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:190_3: sabbapītikāyo sabbalohitikāyo sabbamañjiṭṭhikāyo sabbakaṇhāyo sabbamahāraṅgarattā sabbamahānāmarattāyopi upāhanāyo dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:191_1: khallakabandhā vā āvuso puṭabandhā vā pāliguṇṭhimā vā tūlapuṇṇikā vā tittirapattikā vā meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā
anya-e0905n3:191_2: vā ajavisāṇavaddhikā vā vicchikāḷikā vā morapiñcha parisibbikā vā citrā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ
anya-e0905n3:192_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:192_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū khallakabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:193_1: kaṭṭhapādukāyo āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:194_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggīyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:194_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya kaṭṭhapādukāyo abhiruhitvā ajjhokāse caṅkamanti
anya-e0905n3:194_3: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā khaṭakhaṭasaddā anekavihitaṁ tiracchānakathaṁ kathentā,
anya-e0905n3:195_1: yānena āvuso yāyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:196_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:197_0: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso yānaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:198_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ gilānaṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:198_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya antarāmagge gilāno kukkuccāyanto yānaṁ nābhiruhi,
anya-e0905n3:199_1: uccāsayanamahāsayanāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:200_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:201_1: gocammāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:202_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ pāpabhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:203_1: paccantimesu āvuso janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā ca guṇaṅguṇūpahanañca dhuvanahānañca
anya-e0905n3:203_2: cammāni attharaṇāni ca nissīmagatānaṁ cīvaradānañcāti imāni pañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:204_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ kuṭikaṇṇaṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:204_2: āyasmā bhante soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo etāni pañcavatthūni āyasmato mahākaccānassa vacanena bhagavantaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:205_0: Pucchā – cammasaññuttaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:208_1: pañca āvuso bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:209_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:209_2: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena puṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi na sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n3:209_3: bhattampi bhuttaṁ na sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n3:209_4: te tena kisā ahesuṁ lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā,
anya-e0905n3:211_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule gilāne bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:211_2: sambahulānaṁ gilānānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:212_1: antovuṭṭhaṁvā āvuso antopakkaṁ vā sāmaṁpakkaṁ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:213_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:213_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sāmaṁ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṁ paci,
anya-e0905n3:215_1: manussamaṁsaṁ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṁsaṁ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:216_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:216_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṁsaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n3:217_3: na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṁsaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:218_1: hatthimaṁsaṁ vā āvuso assamaṁsaṁ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:219_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:219_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṁsampi assamaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:220_1: sunakkhamaṁsaṁ vā āvuso ahimaṁsaṁ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:221_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:221_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṁsampi ahimaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:222_1: sīhamaṁsaṁ vā āvuso byagghamaṁsaṁ vā dīpimaṁsaṁ vā acchamaṁsaṁ vā taracchamaṁsaṁ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:223_1: bārāṇasiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:223_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sīhamaṁsampi byagghamaṁsampi dīpimaṁsampi acchamaṁsampi taracchamaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:224_1: gilānassa āvuso guḷaṁ vā agilānassa guḷodakaṁ vā bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:225_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:225_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññāto no agilānassāti kukkuccāyantā guḷaṁ na bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:226_1: jānaṁ āvuso uddissa kataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ paññapetvā tikoṭiparisuddhaṁ maṁsaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:227_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante sīhassa seṭāpatino vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:229_1: pātheyyaṁ āvuso pariyesituñca kappiyakārakānaṁ hatthe upanikkhittahiraññato nibbattaṁ kappiyapaccayaṁ sādituñca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_1: antarā ca bhante bhaddiyaṁ antarā ca aṅguttarāpaṁ meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_2: meṇḍako bhante gahapati bhagavantaṁ yāci “santi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_3: sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātheyyaṁ anujānātū”ti,
anya-e0905n3:232_0: Pucchā – aṭṭha āvuso pānāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n3:233_1: āpaṇe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:233_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā pānāni na paṭiggaṇhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:235_1: sabbañca āvuso ḍākaṁ sabbañca piṭṭhakhādanīyaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:236_1: kusinārāyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:236_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca na paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:237_1: akappiyaṁ āvuso samādapentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:238_1: ātumāyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:239_1: saṅghikāni vā āvuso puggalikāni vā bījāni puggalikāya vā saṅghikāya vā bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṁ datvā paribhuñjituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:240_2: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghikānipi bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:241_1: vinayamahāpadesasaṅkhātāni āvuso cattāri kappiyākappiyaanulomāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n3:242_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n3:242_2: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ kismiñci kismiñciṭhāne kukkuccaṁ uppajji,
anya-e0905n3:243_1: yāvakālikādīhi saṁsaṭṭhānaṁ āvuso yāmakālikādīnaṁ paribhogakālamariyādaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:244_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:244_2: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi “kappati nukho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṁ sattāhakālikaṁ yāvajīvikaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:245_0: Pucchā – bhesajjakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:248_1: vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ kathinaṁ attharituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:249_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante tiṁsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:249_2: tiṁsamattā bhante pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṁ āgacchantā bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
anya-e0905n3:250_0: Pucchā – kathinakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:254_1: gahapaticīvaraṁ āvuso sādiyituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:255_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:255_2: jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhikkhūnaṁ gahapaticīvaraṁ anujānituṁ bhagavantaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:256_0: Pucchā – cha āvuso rajanāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n3:257_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:257_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chakaṇenapi paṇḍumattikāyapi cīvaraṁ rajiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:258_1: acchinnakāni āvuso cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:259_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:259_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāresuṁ dantakasāvāni,
anya-e0905n3:260_1: kadā āvuso bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ chinnakaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ chinnakaṁ antaravāsakaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:261_1: dakkhiṇāgirito bhante pacchāgatakāle bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ chinnakaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ chinnakaṁ antaravāsakaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:262_1: aggaḷaṁ ca āvuso tunnañca ovaṭṭikañca kaṇḍusakañca daḷhīkammañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:263_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:264_1: vassikasāṭikā ca āvuso āgantukabhattañca gamikabhattañca gilānabhattañca gilānupaṭṭhākabhattañca gilānabhesajjañca
anya-e0905n3:264_2: dhuvayāgu ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭikācāti imā aṭṭha bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:265_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:265_2: visākhā bhante migāramātā bhagavantaṁ aṭṭhavarāni yāci,
anya-e0905n3:266_1: bhagavatā āvuso mātāpitūnaṁ dānaṁ anujānitvā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:267_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:267_2: aññatarassa bhante bhikkhuno bahuṁ cīvaraṁ uppannaṁ ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:267_3: so ca taṁcīvaraṁ mātāpitūnaṁ dātukāmo ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:268_0: Mātāpitaroti kho bhikkhave dadamāne kiṁ vadeyyāma,
anya-e0905n3:269_1: aññatra vassaṁ vuṭṭhena āvuso aññatra cīvarabhāgaṁ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:270_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:270_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññatra vassaṁ vuṭṭho aññatra cīvarabhāgaṁ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n3:271_1: anāthakaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ gilānaṁ na upaṭṭhahantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:272_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:272_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṁ viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikārābādho ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:273_1: naggiyaṁ āvuso titthiyasamādānaṁ samādiyantassa thullaccayaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:274_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:274_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu naggiyaṁ titthiyasamādānaṁ samādiyi,
anya-e0905n3:275_1: sabbanīlakāni vā āvuso cīvarāni sabbapītakāni vā sabbalohitakāni vā sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni vā sabbakaṇhānivāti
anya-e0905n3:275_2: evarūpāni cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:276_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:276_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlakādīni cīvarāni dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:277_1: kañcukaṁ vā āvuso veṭhanaṁ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:278_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:278_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kañcukampi dhāresuṁ veṭhanampi dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:279_0: Pucchā – cīvarasaññuttaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:282_1: suddhaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:283_1: campāyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:283_2: bhagavati bhante campāyaṁ viharati sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vāsabhagāme suddhaṁ kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:284_0: Pucchā – campeyyakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:285_0: Vissajjanā – campeyyakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n3:287_1: bhedagarukehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabboti ca,
anya-e0905n3:287_2: bhedagarukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā paresampi saddhāya āpattidesetabbāti ca āvuso ayaṁ sāmaggirasaovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n3:288_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha dinno,
anya-e0905n3:288_2: bhagavati bhante kosambiyaṁ viharati aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpanno ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_3: so tassā āpattiyā āpatti diṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_4: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā anāpatti diṭṭhino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0905n3:288_5: So aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_6: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0905n3:288_7: Atha kho te bhante bhikkhū sāmaggiṁ labhitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:289_1: saṅghabhedassa āvuso mūlabhūte bhikkhumhi ukkhittake osārite tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiñca
anya-e0905n3:289_2: kātuṁ sāmaggī uposathañca kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante teyeva ukkhittakānuvattake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_2: te bhante ukkhittakānuvattakā bhikkhū taṁ ukkhittakaṁ bhikkhuṁ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṁsu
anya-e0905n3:290_3: upasaṅkamitvā te ukkhepake bhikkhū ekadavocuṁ “yasmiṁ āvuso vatthusmiṁ ahosi saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho
anya-e0905n3:290_4: viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo saṅgharāji saṅghavavatthānaṁ saṅghanānākaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_5: so eso bhikkhuṁ āpanno ca ukkhitto ca passi ca osārito ca,
anya-e0905n3:290_6: handa mayaṁ āvuso tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṁ karomā”ti,
anya-e0905n3:291_0: Pucchā – kosambakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n3:292_0: Vissajjanā – kosambakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
